channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description:
1) When I plant bones it gives me way too much exp. How can i reduce the exp given to me?
2) On my client I cannot check the coordinates of my location by clicking tools/wrench. Is there any other way of doing that?
So far that's all

item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Sure, but i g2g right now. Will be back in 15 hours lol.

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

And here’s the void prayerMessage void:
You can tell what it does by looking at it.

public void prayerMessage(int exp, int delete) { setAnimation(827); addSkillXP(exp*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You bury the bones."); deleteItem(delete, getItemSlot(delete), 1); }
the “20” should be xp and the “526” is the item it deletes (the bones)

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Lallz Lallz
item.description:
@Lallz wrote:

Yeah umm look

case 526: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.prayerMessage(20,526); break;

thats all the info i get

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

No no, don’t look for playerxp(5)
Look for the amount of xp you recieve from the bone or just look for the bone’s ID.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Lallz Lallz
item.description:
@Lallz wrote:

Number 2 worked. Thanks. However i still don’t get the part of the Bones Exp. I looked in potions.java for playerxp(5) cuz thats prayer… but like i get nothing. and same in client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

  1. If you’re using delta based source look for the xp you recieved in potions.java i’m sure it has to be there. If not, look in client.java
  2. ::mypos? If you dont have it ,here:

if(command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+""); }

Read full topic
